presentation.title: Welcome to my portfolio
presentation.subtitle: I am Marion Robert and I am a Full-stack Web Developer.

paragraphs.1: With a background in law, I spent three rewarding years supporting asylum seekers in the community sector. Driven by a desire for new things and daily challenges, I retrained in IT.
paragraphs.2: I discovered programming by learning the Python language, then I followed two training courses in web development with Le Wagon and the 3w Academy.
paragraphs.3: Over the last two years, my various apprenticeships, projects and experiences have allowed me to put my knowledge into practice and strengthen my interest in IT.

harmony.title: Harmony
harmony.description: Harmony helps refugees integrate by fostering local interactions. The app allows users to offer or book activities to exchange services and earn points for future assistance.
harmony.features: User sessions; Activity filtering; Content moderation by admin; Email notifications

verdure.title: Verdure
verdure.description: Verdure is a web application for indoor plant sales.
verdure.features: User sessions; Shopping cart; Payment via Stripe; Dashboards for order tracking by users and admins

waw.title: Wall Art Works
waw.description: Wall Art Works is an online store specializing in AI-generated artwork.
waw.features: Google & Facebook login; Product search by keywords; Virtual environment preview; Cart management and Stripe payment

synopsix.title: Synopsix
synopsix.description: Synopsix is a game where players guess a movie title based on its synopsis.
synopsix.features: Word display by proximity score; Hint visualization; Player leaderboard; Game mode and category selection

guitarpick.title: GuitarPick
guitarpick.description: GuitarPick is a guitar rental site inspired by the Airbnb model.
guitarpick.features: User sessions; Geolocation; Product search by keywords; User dashboard; Cloud image hosting
